recommendations: Dr. Bernhard Schmid ‚ÄúStefan is a thought leader. He combines visionary thinking with a strong hands-on approach of getting ambitious goals achieved. In doing so he is one of the most interesting game changers by imposing new business rules / strategies to existing industries. It was great experience supporting him at Crossgate -by facilitating funding and M&A support- when he changed the EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) market fundamentally from a pure-play software market to a 'process as a service' market as Gartner puts it. He will do so again and again I guess when a fragmented market is ripe for change!‚Äù

Jason Jones ‚ÄúStefan Tittel is a natural born leader. He is a big-picture visionary with an intuitive sense for the game-changing opportunity that's always there, lurking, but hidden from everyone else too mired in the details of their day-to-day work-life to notice. He is amazingly persuasive and a master of the boardroom deal. With Stefan Tittel on your side, you're good-to-go already!‚Äù
